sentences.en: As it has non - forfeiture value, life insurance policy has the possibility and reality to be pledged.
sentences.cn: 人寿保险单由于具有不丧失价值而具有可设质的理论可行性和现实性.

sentences.en: Civil and criminal asset forfeiture laws are often confused. Criminal forfeiture involves proven criminals.
sentences.cn: 《民事财产没收法》和《刑事财产没收法》常常被混为一谈.

sentences.en: Forfeiture of bills is an unusual situation in the circulating of bills.
sentences.cn: 票据丧失是票据流转中的异常情况,而且票据丧失还经常与票据伪造相联系.

sentences.en: If he should break his day , what should I gain by the exaction of the forfeiture?
sentences.cn: 如果他到期不还我从这罚金中又能得到什么好处?

sentences.en: Late delivery of materials after the material deadline may result in forfeiture of the advertising space.
sentences.cn: 图文截止日后的图文传递迟延可能导致广告版面的丧失.

sentences.en: Non - payment is forbidden under penalty of forfeiture.
sentences.cn: 严禁不支付,违者处以没收(财产等)的处罚.

sentences.en: Note: Life Non - forfeiture Provisions will apply.
sentences.cn: 注意: 寿险保单之[既有现金价值条款]同时适用.

sentences.en: Refusal to sign meant forfeiture of property and exile.
sentences.cn: 拒绝签字意味着被没收财产并流放国外。

sentences.en: Terminations of insurance policies that have non - forfeiture values.
sentences.cn: 指有不能作废价值的保单的终止.

sentences.en: To penalize by fining or demanding forfeiture.
sentences.cn: 严禁不支付,违者处以没收之处罚.

words.tran_cn: 因受罚而丧失的；被没收的
罚金；没收物；丧失的东西
（因犯罪、失职、违约等）丧失（权利、名誉、生命等）
（财产等的）没收；（权利、名誉等的）丧失

trans.tran_cn: （财产等的）没收，（权利、名誉等的）丧失
trans.tran_en: when someone has their property or money officially taken away because they have broken a law or rule
